title: Looking for a strong modern looking type face for a new car related brand
content:
Any suggestions for typefaces would be appreciated!!

Sincerely,  
Joseph Maguire  
--------------  
 [http://maguiredesign.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020153901/http:/maguiredesign.com/ "http://maguiredesign.com")
author: iggyboo

comments.content: So far I've found aquarius which I think I am headed in the direction with [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/aquarius/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020153901/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/aquarius/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/aquarius/")

You might also enjoy [FP Head](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020153901/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontpartners/fp_head/), which seems inspired by chrome car emblems. [Now available](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020153901/http:/www.fontpartners.com/fpHead_pro.html) in several weights with lowercase.
